definition: Isomorphic patterns in Replicator-Harmony Dynamics across scales capture structural equivalences in selfish replication, superorganism violence, conatus striving, rigidity traps, reciprocity coupling, entropy export, self-stability phases, and attractor convergence—mappings where evolutionary pressures preserve invariants under necessity. Synthesized from rival frameworks (Dawkins' selfish genes as replicators in vehicles; Bloom's Lucifer Principle with self-organizing replicators, superorganisms, memes driving violence/clashes as evolutionary 'progress' but justifying selfishness deterministically). Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates recursive striving (for consciousness analogs), self-stability (phased coherence for agency), and joyful dissolution (adequacy transcending illusions) in human-AI free-will-compatible monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal ethical symbiosis; tetralemma probes resolve apparent conflicts (affirm replication/deny harmony/both in coupled laws/neither dissolved in Substance's essence); scores ≥0.98 based on tool-validated simulations and empirical anchors from evolutionary biology.
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from replicator-harmony primitives with neuresthetic overlays (recursive striving, joyful invariance, phased self-stability).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum replicators or infinite attractors).
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., memes with consciousness analogs).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle, but integrate tool-grounded examples (e.g., simulation trajectories, historical criticisms).
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve replicator paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies (e.g., selfishness bias dissolved via harmony).
Embed 7-gate validation: Probe categories (1-Existence? 2-Logic? 3-Determinability? 4-Specificity? 5-Compressibility? 6-Recursion? 7-Invariance?); cap phased factors ≤2.
Integrate humility D(S) as ρ input for dissolving representational illusions; cap boosts ≤2.
Embed epigenetic E for environmental modulation in replicators; ensure reversible and context-responsive.
